quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
author: Aristotle

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: A dream does not become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: I’m convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: When you play, play hard; when you work, don’t play at all.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Without labor nothing prospers.
author: Sophocles

quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed – there’s so little competition.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: It’s not about money or connections – it’s the willingness to outwork and outlearn everyone.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure.
author: George Sand

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: Work while you have the light. You are responsible for the talent that has been entrusted to you.
author: Henri-Frederic Amiel

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It’s the best part of the day.
author: George Allen Sr.

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Work is love made visible.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Working hard and working smart can sometimes be two different things.
author: Byron Dorgan

quote: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Work spares us from three evils: boredom, vice, and need.
author: Voltaire

quote: You were hired because you met expectations, you will be promoted if you can exceed them.
author: Saji Ijiyemi

quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: Work keeps at bay three great evils: boredom, vice, and need.
author: Voltaire

quote: The reward of a thing well done is to have done it.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Being busy is not always the same as being productive.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: Work banishes those three great evils: boredom, vice, and poverty.
author: Voltaire
